entity.name: Babylonian - Nergal
entity.subtitle: Lord of the Underworld - God of War, Plague, and Death
entity.description: Nergal is the fierce god of war, plague, fire, and death—the scorching summer sun that brings fever and pestilence. As king of the underworld, he rules alongside his consort Ereshkigal over the land of no return. He embodies destructive power, martial prowess, and the inevitable mortality that claims all living beings. Warriors invoke him for victory, but all fear his wrath in the form of disease and violent death.

relationships.allies: Ereshkigal(co-ruler), the Sebetti (warrior-spirits), Namtar (plague demon and vizier)

family.parents: Enlil(king of gods) and Ninlil, though sometraditionsname other parents
